data.name: SARIS Ltd.
data.description:
SARIS is a family-owned business. We are dedicated manufacturers of essential oils and floral waters, striving for excellence in everything we do.


Our mission and vision:

To be as true and as close to nature by creating a circular economy, guaranteeing sustainability through renewable green energy and minimum waste.

We build honest and sustainable, long-lasting relationships with nature and our clients.


Our creations:

In our distillery, we process typically Bulgarian plants and produce:

  • Lavender essential oil (Lavandula angustifolia) and floral water (hydrolate)
  • Rose essential oil (Rosa Damascena) and floral water (hydrolate)
  • Smoke tree (Sumac) essential oil (Cotinus coggygria) and floral water (hydrolate)
  • Lemon balm essential oil (Melissa officinalis) a﻿nd floral water (hydrolate)
  • Peppermint essential oil (Mentha pipperita) and floral water (hydrolate)
  • Other - upon request


Certifications & registrations:

  • EU organic certificate for BIO production
  • REACH


For more information, don't hesitate to contact us at saris@lavender.bg or call +359 (0)52 703 971 (Bulgaria), +34 622 252 856 (Spain).

data.name: SARIS Lemon Balm Floral Water (Melissa officinalis)
data.description: SARIS Lemon Balm Floral Water (Melissa officinalis) is a natural lemon balm floral water produced by the distillation of lemon balm.Applications:as micellar water - cleanses, moisturizes, tones and refreshes the skin, helps against acnehelps with depression, anxiety and insomniain aromatherapy - calms the nerves and reduces stress, insomnia, restores clarity of perception, harmonizes the body and mindas a tonic - refreshes and tones (sprayed on your face, palms or around to enjoy the citrus, lemon-like scent)reduces redness and irritation after shaving or hair removal (waxing, depilation), commonly used as an aftershave

data.name: SARIS Peppermint Essential Oil (Mentha piperita)
data.description: SARIS Peppermint Essential Oil from Mentha piperitaUsage: raw material for perfumery, cosmetics, aromatherapy, food industry, medicine and pharmacy.Applications:has  a balancing effect on oily skincooling and soothing effect on the skin (especially after sunburn)boosts energy and reduce fatiguenatural treatment for nauseahelps relieve congestion of the sinuses, and prevents other problems including nasal congestion, asthma, bronchitis, cold, and coughrelieves indigestion or upset stomachnatural remedy for dandruff, dry, flaky scalpstimulates hair growthneutralizes bad breath and unpleasant body odorscommon flavoring agent in foods and beveragesused as a fragrance in soaps and cosmeticsdeodorizes and removes unpleasant odors in enclosed spaces (home, office, etc.)used as a massage oil to soothe muscle tension and soreness.

data.name: SARIS Rose Essential Oil 100% (Rosa damascena)
data.description: SARIS Rose Essential Oil 100% (Rosa damascena) soothes and harmonizes the mind and helps ease depression, anger, grief, fear, tension and stress. Improves sexuality, self-esteem and dealing with emotional issues.Rose oil is also an excellent remedy for poor circulation and heart problems, such as palpitation of the heart (tachycardia) and arrhythmia. It also helps with high blood pressure and is used to stimulate the liver and gall-bladder.When it comes to the respiratory system, rose oil helps with in cases of asthma, cough and hay fever.It cleanses the liver and helps with nausea.Rose oil has a strong cleansing effect on the female reproductive system and can be used to regulate and balance hormones, irregular menstruation, functional infertility, white flow, menorrhagia, uterine bleeding and other uterine issues, while having a tonic effect on the uterus.Applied on the skin, the essential oil has a moisturizing and hydrating effect. Rose oil has is an antiseptic which is suitable for all skin types and has a very good effect on dry and irritated skin. It is also used for ruptured capillaries, inflammation and redness of the skin as well as eczema and herpes.Inhaler application:In the treatment with steam, rose oil helps with allergies, asthma, anxiety, headaches, migraines, stress, etc. This oil is effective in dealing with depression, anger, grief and sadness.Application in massage oils & baths:Rose oil mixed with massage oils or dissolved in a bath can help ease allergies, anxiety, asthma, fever, headache, depression, migraines, mild tension, depression, sadness, stress, tranquilizes cardiac rhythm, acts as a general tonic for the skin.Application in creams and lotions:Mixed in creams and lotions, rose oil stimulates the skin, as it has a moisturizing and hydrating effect. This works well for all skin types, but is especially useful for the dry and sensitive skin. The oil helps reduce redness and skin inflammations and acts as a general tonic.

data.name: SARIS Lavender Essential Oil (Lavandula angustifolia)
data.description: Lavender essential oil from Lavandula angustifolia - one of the most popular and versatile essential oils, used in various industries as a raw material for perfumery, cosmetics, aromatherapy, food industry, medicine and pharmacy.Applications:soothes and relaxes the body and mindclears up a headache or migraineimproves stress, anxiety and moodused in massage therapyhelps treat acne and soothes irritated skinimproves sleep and insomnianatural insect repellent and treatment for head lice, relieves itchy bug bitesused in the food industry for flavoring foods and beverageshelps combat fungal and viral infectionsrelieves respiratory symptoms such as cough and sore throathelps speed up the healing of small burns, cuts, scrapes and woundslessens menopausal and PMS symptomshas been shown to improve memory loss and dementia symptoms due to its potent antioxidant propertiescan improve hair healthcan help reduce blood pressure and heart rate

data.name: SARIS Smoke Tree Floral Water (Cotinus coggygria)
data.description: SARIS Smoke Tree Floral Water (Cotinus coggygria) is a natural smoke tree water produced by the distillation of smoke tree.Ingredients: distilled water and smoke tree oil from Cotinus coggygriaApplication and benefits:has antibacterial, anti-fungal and anti-inflammatory propertiessoothes coughs, gingivitisinsects repellentespecially valuable natural gift for women: douches with tetra water help with vaginal infections (white flow), cystitis, as well as faster healing of wounds and stitches after childbirthgargling is recommended for the prevention of oral hygiene - bad breath, inflamed gums, periodontitis, cold sores or herpesexternal rinsing with sumac water helps with problems such as hemorrhoids, atopic dermatitis

data.name: SARIS Smoke Tree / Sumac Essential Oil (Cotinus coggygria)
data.description: SARIS Smoke Tree / Sumac essential oil from Cotinus coggygria - one of the most powerful antiseptics in nature. Along with its other health-promoting properties (antibacterial, anti-inflammatory and antifungal), it is an important ingredient in various pharmaceutical and cosmetic products for the whole body.Usage: raw material for perfumery, cosmetics, aromatherapy, food industry, medicine and pharmacy. Applications:powerful disinfectant due to its natural antiseptic and antibacterial action (a few drops of it in a diffuser can help freshen and purify the air in any room)has antiviral propertiessoothes coughsgargling diluted in water sumac essential oil is recommended for acute and chronic inflammation of the oral cavity, laryngitis, pharyngitis, toothache, canker sores, bleeding gums and periodontitisused as insect repellentsupports skin health for occasional blemishes or irritations, dry skin, and cleansing.helps prevent sweaty feet (baths with water and a few drops of smoke tree essential oil)applied to the area of ​​injury or pain, soothes the inflammatory processes in the skin, relieves the swelling, helps heal hard-to-heal wounds, helps with itching, baby sores and skin irritations (commonly applied via compresses - a few drops of smoke tree oil are added to 10 ml of base oil)

data.name: SARIS Peppermint Floral Water (Mentha piperita)
data.description: SARIS Peppermint Floral Water (Mentha piperita) is a natural peppermint floral water produced by the distillation of peppermint.Applications:Facial tonic - cleanses, tones, cools, soothes and maintains the water balance of combination and oily skinRelieves itching of the skin and scalpMouthwash - due to its anti-inflammatory and antimicrobial action is an excellent tool for the prevention of oral hygieneHair care - through friction accelerates hair growth and removes dandruffSuitable for oral hygieneHelps cool down the skin after sun exposureIts fresh aroma revives senses and invigorates the mood

data.name: SARIS Bio Lavender Essential Oil (Lavandula angustifolia)
data.description:
Organic Lavender essential oil from Lavandula angustifolia - one of the most popular and versatile essential oils, used in various industries as a raw material for perfumery, cosmetics, aromatherapy, food industry, medicine and pharmacy.

Applications:


	soothes and relaxes the body and mind
	clears up a headache or migraine
	improves stress, anxiety and mood
	used in massage therapy
	helps treat acne and soothes irritated skin
	improves sleep and insomnia
	natural insect repellent and treatment for head lice, relieves itchy bug bites
	used in the food industry for flavoring foods and beverages
	helps combat fungal and viral infections
	relieves respiratory symptoms such as cough and sore throat
	helps speed up the healing of small burns, cuts, scrapes and wounds
	lessens menopausal and PMS symptoms
	has been shown to improve memory loss and dementia symptoms due to its potent antioxidant properties
	can improve hair health
	can help reduce blood pressure and heart rate

data.name: SARIS Rose Floral Water (Rosa damascena)
data.description: SARIS Rose Floral Water (Rosa damascena) is a natural rose floral water produced by the distillation of rose (Rosa Damascena).Applications:Topical (applied on the skin) - cooling and soothing, improves the elasticity of sun-dried skin, neutralizes itchingRegenerates skin cells and slows down skin agingHas hydrating and antioxidant action on the skinCommonly used as miscelar waterHas a hydrating and anti-inflammatory effectBeneficial for the treatment of inflamed bronchiHelps treat eye infections ( such as conjunctivitis, conjunctival xerosis or dry eye, acute dacryocystitis, degenerative conditions, such as pterygium or pinguecula cataracts) and oral infections due to its antibacterial propertiesNourishes and brings shine to the hairUsed as a flavoring agent in the food industryUsed in aromatherapy since ancient times

Rose oil has is an antiseptic which is suitable for all skin types and has a very good effect on dry and irritated skin. It is also used for ruptured capillaries, inflammation and redness of the skin as well as eczema and herpes.Inhaler application:In the treatment with steam, rose oil helps with allergies, asthma, anxiety, headaches, migraines, stress, etc. This oil is effective in dealing with depression, anger, grief and sadness.Application in massage oils & baths:Rose oil mixed with massage oils or dissolved in a bath can help ease allergies, anxiety, asthma, fever, headache, depression, migraines, mild tension, depression, sadness, stress, tranquilizes cardiac rhythm, acts as a general tonic for the skin.Application in creams and lotions:Mixed in creams and lotions, rose oil stimulates the skin, as it has a moisturizing and hydrating effect. data.name: SARIS Ltd.
data.description:
SARIS is a family-owned business. We are dedicated manufacturers of essential oils and floral waters, striving for excellence in everything we do.


Our mission and vision:

To be as true and as close to nature by creating a circular economy, guaranteeing sustainability through renewable green energy and minimum waste.

We build honest and sustainable, long-lasting relationships with nature and our clients.


Our creations:

In our distillery, we process typically Bulgarian plants and produce:

  • Lavender essential oil (Lavandula angustifolia) and floral water (hydrolate)
  • Rose essential oil (Rosa Damascena) and floral water (hydrolate)
  • Smoke tree (Sumac) essential oil (Cotinus coggygria) and floral water (hydrolate)
  • Lemon balm essential oil (Melissa officinalis) a﻿nd floral water (hydrolate)

BEAUTY.TITLE: Beauty by Lubrizol Life Science
BEAUTY.DESCRIPTION: LLS partners with customers to develop, manufacture and market a broad range of differentiated ingredients for skin care, hair care and skin cleansing.

PEAS.TITLE: Plant Proteins by Roquette

WHY_CHEMISTRY.HEADING: Driving the world's most impactful industry forward.

SECTION_1.DESCRIPTION: At Knowde, we believe in the power of chemistry. We believe that easy and efficient access to information and raw materials enables you to work smarter and faster so you can continue to make a rich global impact.

SECTION_2.DESCRIPTION: Your innovations have decreased the carbon footprint of the automotive industry, imagined a sustainable agricultural future, developed alternative, biodegradable packaging materials, and changed the landscape of connectivity forever – to name a few. This is only the beginning.
SECTION_2.HEADING: We can't wait to see what you create with Knowde.

ROW.TITLE: Knowde Software

0.TITLE: Knowde for Suppliers
0.DESCRIPTION: Transform how customers discover, engage and transact with you online with turnkey solutions for ingredient, polymer and chemical suppliers.

1.TITLE: Knowde for Distributors
1.DESCRIPTION: Delight both your principals and your customers with a modern online experience that differentiates your brand and accelerates business growth.

0.TITLE: Master Data Management Platform
0.DESCRIPTION: Digital transformation begins with clean data. Knowde organizes your structured product data in a matter of weeks.

1.TITLE: Customer Experience Application

2.TITLE: Knowde Marketplace

TOOLTIP.TITLE: Why is this important?
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_I: Knowde is a B2B platform where customers and suppliers conduct business online. Using a business email address demonstrates the legitimacy of your company and commercial intent, and you are much more likely to receive responses to your requests.
TOOLTIP.PARAGRAPH_II: You can still use a personal email but you may have additional company verification steps before getting access to all of {companyName}'s features.

PAYWALL.TITLE_1: Get new products to market faster with a free Knowde Marketplace account
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_1: Gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers from 8,000 suppliers. Browse, search, and filter to quickly compare products, find information, request documents, order samples, and get quotes directly from suppliers.
PAYWALL.TITLE_2: The fastest way to find the right raw materials for your products
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_2: Search and filter over 250,000 chemicals, ingredients and polymers, access documents and download starter formulations. Interact with over 8,000 suppliers whose representatives are ready to help. Sign up for a free Knowde Marketplace account today.
PAYWALL.DESCRIPTION_3: Create a free account to gain instant access to our marketplace of over 250,000 products and their documents.
